1111.content: How dose she acquire the jutsu?
1111.title: Jutsu

11111.content:
Sakura was out at the Hyuga residence teaching Hinata a few new jutsu’s. While waiting for her to come home, Sakura was looking through some of the old jutsu scrolls her family has. One of the scrolls she was looking at was call New Family Pregnancy Jutsu. She tried to read it but the writing is so faded that it was unreadable. She was still able to make out the hand sighs and made sure she was doing them correctly. When she got it down, Sakura used the jutsu unaware of what it does.

“New Family Pregnancy Jutsu.” Sakura said at the last signal.

A puff of smoke formed around Sakura and disappeared. Sakura looked at herself in the mirror and saw nothing about her changed.

“Maybe I was supposed to think about someone.” Sakura said.

Sakura looked at the scroll again and tried to make out the writing. It was still a bit unreadable but she managed to make out something on it.

“Whoever uses this jutsu, male or female, will become pregnant.” Sakura said aloud.

She looked down at her belly and noticed that it is slightly bigger. She felt it a bit and felt how firm it is. She figured she is about a month pregnant with one baby. She also noticed her appetite had grown a bit as well. She went down to the kitchen and found Hinata there waiting for her. Hinata took notice of her belly and smiled.

“I see you found my mother’s scroll.” Hinata said.

“I was just looking around to learn some new jutsu’s I.” Sakura said.

“As long as you didn’t go into my father’s scroll room. He hates it even he goes into it and even more if anyone messes with his scrolls.”

Sakura went on teaching Hinata and made sure she didn’t do anything or used any jutsu’s that would harm her unborn child.
11111.title: Scroll

111111.content:
Sakura helped Hinata with her training until she is right where she is suppose to be. Hinata noticed Sakura is getting a little round in her belly but didn’t want to tell her that she is getting fat. so she didn’t let Sakura know in fear she will hate her.

“Hey Hinata, ive noticed you’ve been looking at my belly a lot when im with you. Are you feeling alright?” Sakura asked.

“Im fine Sakura. By the chance would you actually be pregnant from my mothers jutsu?” Hinata asked.

“You know, I think I am. I have had shown the signs of early pregnancy and have been gaining a bit of a belly.”

Hinata poked it and Sakura didn’t taking a liking to it. she jumped back and slapped Hinata. Sakura apolgiezed to her and told her that she dosent like being touched there. Hinata understood and went on her way. Sakura made her way home but stopped by the market to get a couple things. When she passed by something she likes to eat, she feels like she was going to throw up and knew it was just a reaction from her pregnancy. She got what she needed and went home to relax. Her mother knew of her pregnancy and supported her threw it so far and will keep supporting her until the end. She told Sakura that as long as she’s pregnant, she can stay at home.

Sakura was enjoying being a new mother to be but the morning sickness and all the other things she’s been going through in the last 2 months of her pregnancy along with the slight bloating and belly pain along with the weight gain. She thought it was just part of her pregnancy so she went to have it checked out.

“Ok Sakura, let’s take a look.” Tsunade said.

Tsunade started to examine Sakura to see if there is anything wrong. When she finished, she told Sakura that there is nothing to worry about. It is just the normal stuff that a pregnant woman goes through at this point in their pregnancy. She was happy that there was nothing to worry about and poked her belly a couple times.

“Now to make sure everything is alright, you better take some time off from being a ninja.” Tsunade said.

“I will. I hope Naruto would be fine without me for a while.” Sakura said.

“I’m sure he will. Due to how much he’s trained and with Kakashi around, he’ll be fine without you for the next couple months.”

Sakura went home and got settled in. she told her mother that she is taking the next few months off from being a ninja to focus mainly on her pregnancy. Sakura knew it was going to be hard but she did what she can to keep active for the time being by cleaning and checking in on Naruto periodically and clean his place up. She was worried about him while he was gone for she didn’t want to raise their kid alone. Every time Naruto leaves on another mission outside the village, Sakura told him to come right to her first so she knows he’s fine and alive.

She wanted to become a ninja again for a while until she gives birth but for some reason her heart stops when she thinks of that and something happening to Naruto. So Sakura stayed as she is and looked for a job. She got one working at a small ramen shop near their apartment to bring in some money while Naruto isn’t on missions or away on them. While on her way back home, Sakura found it was unlocked and someone was inside. She braced herself for what’s going to happen. She entered the apartment and saw Tsunade in the kitchen. She was quite large compared to the last time she saw her.

“Lady Tsunade, I’m not expecting to see you for another couple weeks.” Sakura said.

“I know, I came by because I just got news of Naruto. Apparently he disappeared and no one knows where he is at. We think he has been captured or killed.” Tsunade said.

When Sakura heard that, her heart immediately stopped. She started to freak out but Tsunade managed to calm her down. Sakura admitted that if he is dead, she will do all she can to raise their baby. She felt the Hokage’s body and knew for sure she is definitely fatter. Tsunade admitted that she has put on some weight. Sakura loved how soft she was and told her she was the same way.

“Well, I think we should make your body match your life and heart.” Tsunade said.

She helped Sakura put on some weight for her baby. She felt her unborn kick a bit and Tsunade felt it. They went to the shop that Sakura works at to start her gain. Over the last 4 months that Sakura has been pregnant, her appetite as grown quite a bit and her heart has soften to be more gentle and more mother like. They found that she is having a daughter who was going to be great. Sakura could feel her daughter’s heart already beating in her and loved how soft, gentle and rhythmic it is. She gave gentle kicks every now and again to assure her mother that she is still up and well. She only kicked hard when she is hungry or when something bad was going to happen. Sakura loved how her little feet felt and wished she could keep her in there for life.

115332223322212.content:
The life of a shinobi was far more difficult than Sakura Haruno ever realized. Coming from a civilian family, she lacked the necessary reserves and the grace of those born to clans. They had an early start on their training while she and a few others elected to go on diets and pine after a certain Uchiha instead.

Looking back she couldn't believe how much of a fan girl she'd been. How much her crush on Sasuke affect her and her team. She was smart sure, tops of her class, but when it came to anything physical she was essentially useless. She only knew basic academy techniques and because of her diet she was a complete string bean. If not for Naruto, Sasuke, or Kakashi-sensei, she'd have been dead a hundred times over.

In fact, it was the Chunin Exams themselves that fully put everything into perspective. Outside of the written portion she was dead weight. She was no help against Orochimaru, a distraction at best for the sound nin, and couldn't even get past her rival Ino in the preliminaries. Worse yet, all she could do was play damsel in distress when the village was invaded and had to rely on Naruto and Sasuke to save her. Pathetic. She really was pathetic.

Then Sasuke left. She was teary eyed mess that didn't even have the strength to go chasing after him. Once again she had to rely on Naruto to do everything she couldn't do on her own. Weak! She had been so damn weak! To think she thought she could talk Sasuke out of leaving. If she had even a shred of muscle she could've knocked him out or... something!

Oh well, that was then and this was now. It had been two years since then, and in that time she'd made a lot of changes. The number one being bulking up. Currently she was sat at home in the basement, which her parents had reluctantly let her transform into a personal gym. Working on jutsu with lady Tsunade and her peers was fun, but she treasured this personal time to work exclusively on her body.

It took a while, but these two years had done wonders for her. In that time she'd grown a lot, going up to 5'4" inches to be exact. Her arms were bigger, her abs rock hard, her ass tight, and her thighs tone. Her new look garnered more than a few stares, most ranging from shock, to awe, to even envy. But it didn't stop there, even after hulking up like she wanted it still wasn't enough. Pumping iron had become an addiction. She needed to work out. Not a day went by where she didn't.

Sakura would never be satisfied until her bulging muscle where coated in sweat. She couldn't stop until she felt sore all over. Pain wouldn't deter her either, it was just weakness leaving the brick-shithouse that was her body. Each and every day was mission to get more and more shredded. Just having an eight pack wasn't enough, she wanted sixteen. She wanted to be the most swole kunoichi in history, if she wasn't already. Why did it feel so good to work out? Why hadn't she start sooner?

Right now her entire body was soaking in sweat from benching more than 1000 pounds, and that was without the use of chakra. She was determined to get her good 1000 in. She just had to. "999... 1000!" she groaned before placing the weights back on the rack. She then slowly sat up on her bench and took a deep breath, taking in the sweet scent of her hard work. There was nothing like the smell of sweat to re-affirm a job well done. It still wasn't enough though. Unfortunately she didn't have time for more. She had to report to Hokage tower today. That meant she had to hit the shower and put on something fresh.

She reached down to grab a bottle water and wasted no time chugging it. After benching so much, water was the most refreshing thing in the world. She then reached down for her towel and quickly wiped her face before draping it around her neck. If she wanted to stay on schedule she should get moving. She gave her arms one good flex before standing up, pleased to see her veins bulging. She soon frowned however. "It's still not enough." she whispered.

She only made it to the bottom stair before pausing. She turned back to her homemade gym with longing in her eyes... she'd be cutting it close but, maybe she could get a quick one in before hitting the showers?
115332223322212.title: Training

choices: Sakura gets dressed and heads out
Sakura blows off the Hokage and works out
1153322233222121.content:
Sakura sighed, she didn't want to insult her mentor by arriving late. She wasn't Kakashi-sensei who deliberately went out of his way to show up late to everything, whether it be training or team meetings. She could still remember him being late to the academy to pick up her and her team, and her and Naruto scolding him over his constant tardiness. No, she wouldn't take after her sensei in this regard. She turned away and made her way upstairs, she could always get another set or two in when she got back.

Along the way she ran into her parents who were busy cutting coupons out of the local newspaper. They gave their usual greeting having long since gotten used to their daughter's bulging muscles. Once that was over she made her way upstairs to where the shower was. She turned the knobs and waited for the water to get hot. Showering after a hard workout was as natural as brushing her teeth.

Soon the steam from the water began to rise and Sakura knew it was time. The first thing to go was the sports bra. Sakura quickly removed the sweat soaked garment and listened closely as it hit the bathroom floor with a wet splat. The final article to go where her panties. She didn't wear shorts when working out at home because she liked the freedom and feeling of cool air against her skin. Those too hit the ground with a wet splat.

Finally with her clothes discarded she kicked them to the side and went to examine herself in the mirror. She was pumped up, that's for certain. Her arms were jacked like a bodybuilders and her veins throbbed whenever she flexed. That was a true sign of how seriously she took her workouts, but even with the current results in front of her it was never enough. She wanted to bigger than this, More swole than this. She wanted muscles on top of muscles that were unrivaled. Natural bulk that put even steroids to shame.

Just thinking about finally having her dream body was enough to make her salivate. She quickly wiped her moth however and hopped in the shower. She let out a long groan of contentment when she felt the warm water against her skin. The way it trickled down her body and loosened her up always amazed her. Even before she had her muscles, a warm shower always did relax her.

She took a few minutes to just stand there and enjoyed the feeling before reaching down for a wash cloth and soap. Naturally she started with her arms. Slowly she scrapped the soaped up cloth against her skin and she could feel the rock hard muscle underneath. Even without flexing she was solid. Next came the chest and abs. She never had a particularly large chest, for some reason fate designed she have a fine ass instead. Why couldn't she have both? Hinata did! Whatever, what she lacked in bust she more than made up for in bulk.

She scarped and scraped against her torso and abdomen in in frustration. At least she'd be cleaner faster. She watched as soap ran down her chest and passed her abs, It felt nice, but now it was time to focus on her back and glutes. Thankfully stretches were a part of her routine, it definitely made getting to those hard to reach places much easier.

Her back was clean in no time at all and that just left her rear. She furiously scrubbed her behind for what felt like a solid twenty minutes. Why she spent so much time washing her ass, she'll never know. She then moved on to everything else below the belt. When that was finished she made it back to her arms so she could scrub her pits. She laughed nervously to herself at nearly forgetting.

Finally the only thing left to do was her hair. She hung up her wash cloth and made a grab for the shampoo. She squeezed the thick blue gel into her hands and began to rub it into her scalp. Washing her hair was something she always enjoyed. Even more so now that her fingers were stronger and could really massage the stuff in. Sakura simply closed her eyes and just let her fingers run wild.

This went on for a good while before finally running her head under the water. "Ahhh!" Sakura sighed. She needed this far more than she realized today. She shut the water off soon after and stepped out. On the back of the bathroom door was her bath robe which she wasted no time putting on. She stepped out of the bathroom feeling fresher than she had earlier and began to stretch. Hearing her muscles pop was oh so satisfying.

"I really needed that."
1153322233222121.title: Shower

11533222332221211.content:
The squeaky clean kunoichi made her way to her room before shutting the door behind her. Her personal space hadn't changed all that much since her Genin days. Her bedroom was still pink and the only real differences where the one or two motivational posters on the walls and the mini weights in the corner. She liked to take it easy before going to bed.

She ignored the ''before bed weights '' as she dubbed them however, and instead focused her full attention on her closet. Opening the door she was greeted to a small square room that housed her various attires and more than a few boxes of junk and protein.

"What to wear? What to wear?" Sakura wondered. Her style of dress hadn't really changed that much over the past two years either. She still wore pink as it was her main color, but she did ditch the sleeves on all her outfits and had to buy much bigger sizes than before. That was understandable considering her old outfits couldn't contain her new figure.

She scanned through the various clothes on hangers wondering what it was she should grab. Should she wear her ninja gear or something more casual? Honestly she wasn't sure as she had no idea what her meeting with her mentor was even about. Last time she went to a meeting with the Fifth, she casually only to find out she was needed at the hospital. It was so embarrassing. She looked so incompetent not being fully prepared.

She wouldn't make that mistake again. She'd dress in her ninja gear and seal up her other outfits in a scroll just in case she needed to change. Yeah, that sounded good. She'd definitely feel better knowing she had a change of clothes and didn't need them instead of needing them and not having them on hand. She was a damn genius.

Smiling to herself she grabbed what she needed and laid her clothes across the bed. She then went to her dresser and stripped out of her robe before quickly sliding on her underclothes. After that it didn't take long for her to get dressed and seal away the rest of her clothes in a scroll. She felt more than pleased with herself.

Looking herself over in her dresser mirror she couldn't help but flex just a little. It might not have been enough, but it was still a good prelude for things to come. She'd keep training and get bigger and stronger until finally her physical strength was unrivaled. Looking at the throbbing veins on her rock hard biceps filled her with hope that she would make that goal a reality. She needed to make it a reality. Not just for herself but for her precious people too, No longer would she need to rely on Naruto or Kakashi-sensei to bail her out, she'd finally show them she was on the level.

With that thought in mind, Sakura headed downstairs to collect her boot sandals. Like with her clothes she had to get a new pair to match her growing foot, the old ones wouldn't suffice anymore. She swiftly zipped them up and called out to her parents that she was headed out.

After shutting the door behind her, the pumped-up shinobi was ready to take on the day.

123332211122111211232323321.title: Hinata comes back

choices: A week latter, Hinata retires from being a ninja
1233322112.content:
Hinata nervously tapped her pointer fingers as she made her way to Konoha's favorite ramen shack, Ichiruka Ramen. It had been a couple months after the four ninja war and the world was still rebuilding itself from Marada assault. As a ninja, Hinata had absolutely no free time whatsoever since she was helping with the rebuild. But alas the repairs were coming to an end and the amount of normal mission had dropped severely with the five great nations at peace. Taking a deep breath, she pulled back the segmented curtain to the modest ramen stand and quietly grabbed a stool.

"Hey, Hinata-chan." Everyone's favorite knuckle-head ninja shouted as she sat down. Her heart pounded in the chest and she blushed brightly.

"Hello, Naruto-kun" She said softly without shuddering. "Thank you for inviting me to dinner."

"No problem." He said as he sheepishly. He turned to Teuchi, "Two Miso Ramen, please." As Teuchi when to work on their meal, the two sat in awkward silences. "So......How have you been?" Naruto asked trying this best at small talk.

"I have been fine, just tried." She said softly.

"I know what you mean. These repairs are taking forever, and I can't just be a lazy bastard like teme." Naruto grumbled at the thought of his rival. Hinata giggled lightly, Naruto cracks a grin.

"How is Sakura handling him leaving again?"

"She is a little sad still, but she is content. He send her a post card a couple of days ago and her face lite up like new years." Naruto replied with a faint grin. "I am happy everything worked out in the end."

"That is good, I am happy for those two." She paused for a moment. "I heard that she was thinking about retiring from being a ninja?"

"Yeah, she is thinking about it. She thinks that with this new found peace that the need for ninja is going to drop and there won't be enough work for all of us?"

"It makes sense, when you think about it." Just then, Teuchi set their meals in front of them.

"Well, lets eat before our food gets cold." The two ate quietly, well as quietly as Naruto can be. Naruto quickly finished and ordered them both a second helping.

"Are you thinking about retiring?" Naruto asked.

         Hinata thought for a moment as she finished her bowl. "Maybe, the world doesn't really need so many ninja with the state of peace we are in. Plus, I'm going to have to some day if I ever want to start a family."

         Teuchi set their new bowls in front of them, "What would you do if you did retire, besides start a family?" Naruto asked before he started eating.

"What do you mean?" Hinata asked confused slightly.

"Like if you cause do anything, any job, any like, hell any fantasy, what would it be?" Hinata turned bright red as her deeps fantasy crossed her mind. She turned an even brighter shaded of red as she tried to hide in her ramen. She started shoveling noodles under her throat. Naruto quickly relieving his blunder attacked his own ramen as his mind when into a full panic.

'Why did I just ask that! I'm so stupid!"

         Hinata was lost in her own thoughts, but for a completely different reason. 'I have to stop thinking about that.' A light groan echoed in her throat as the image of herself a good hundred pounds heavier laying on a bed with naruto stuffing her with rich treats with one hand and playing when her fat with the other. She turned scarlet at the thought as she mentally screamed at herself.

         Another thought popped in her head. 'Naruto is paying and he bought me more without asking. Is he trying to fatten me up?' She knew that wasn't the case, he was just being himself. But the thought had done it's damage and she sucked down her second bowl of ramen.

         Hinata finished before Naruto. "Hinata, I-" His voice died in his throat as he caught sight of her. Her face was flushed and slightly sweaty and she was cradling the small bulge that was her stomach. Her eyes were half closed as she turned to look at him.

"Yes Naruto-kun?"

"I....I'm sorry about earlier, that was a really personal question. I didn't mean to make you feel uncomfortable. How about I make it up to you, you like cinnamon rolls, right? Dessert is on me." He said as he nervously scratched the back of his neck. One of Naruto's flaw was he had no idea what a normal person's appetite was, since he had to consume massive amounts of food to sate kumura.

         Hinata's pale eyes widened, cinnamon rolls were her favorite food and guilt pleasure. No matter how full she was, she should not say no the sugary treat. She heaved herself out of her stool and grabbed Naruto's hand. Naruto quickly tossed the bill on the counter as she dragged him out of the ramen stand. Naruto half stumbled down the street as he tried to figure out what the heck was going on.

"Hinata, slow down."

         Hinata ground to halt and Naruto did everything in his power not to run into her. She stared at the ground nervously with a blush on her cheeks.

"Sorry."

"It is fine." Naruto replied scratching his head for the millionth time that night. He awkwardly put his arm around her, his hand resting just above her hip. "Let go get you that dessert I promised."

         The two walked down the street without saying another word. Hinata blushed a deep crimson as he hold her close to him so they wouldn't get separated. Naruto was busy trying not to blush and figure out what was up with her. They soon reached the local bakery and Naruto picks out a large cinnamon roll out.

"Aren't you going to get anything?" Hinata asked quietly.

"Nay, this is for you." He said this a light blush.

         Hinata smiled and took his hand, leading him down the street. "Hinata, where are we going?" He asked, now completely confused. She just glanced back at him with a faint blush and a trust me look in her eyes. So he followed her quietly, soon they reached a small park near the academy. Memories of lonelier days, days when he was an outcast and a freak. Hinata squeezed his hand gently, noticing his expression.

         She lead him to a small deck at the edge of the park. She sat down and he followed her lead and took a seat as well. "You want to know what I would do if I could live out any fantasy?" She asked as she stared at the pastry in her lap. Naruto's eyebrows shot up in curiosity. "I would get fat."

         Naruto's jaw dropped and he was more than a little confused. "Fat?"

         She blushed brightly and her hands tightened around the cinnamon roll, crushing it slightly. "Yeah, ever sense I was little I have wanted to be bigger. But I could never do it myself, I am to scared to live it out."

"So you want to be fat but you can't because you are scared?" Naruto asked putting his hand on top of her clenched hands. She relaxed slightly.

"Mmmhm." She nodded.

"What if someone else fattened you up, you know take the choice out of your hands?" Hinata's head shot up and she stared at him with wide eyes. She stared at him in silence for a few minutes before blushed red as a rose before looking away.

"I am sorry, you must think I am a total freak." She stuttered as she bowed her head, nearly on the brink of tears. His hand squeezed her's gently.

"No, I just never figured you were a feedee is all." He said firmly. She turn back to face him with a hopeful yet confused look. "Yeah, I know what a feedee is. You pick up stuff like that when you travel the world with the biggest prev in history."

"You aren't freaked out by this." She said in a low voice.

"Nope."

         She unzipped her jacket, giving him full view of her bloated stomach. She grabbed his hand and placed it flat against her hard belly. "You aren't freaked out that I want by this? You don't think it is gross or weird?"

"Nope." he said as pressed a little harder against her belly. She let out a small moan as she winced. "Look like someone is pretty full."

"Mmmmhm," She hummed as he slowed rubbing her belly. Her eyes fluttered closed.

"But I think you have a little room. You don't want this you go to waste." He said as he took the cinnamon roll out of her hands and held it in front of her lips. Hinata took a large bite out of the cinnamon roll and moaned as her belly surged forward a little. He fed her bite after bite as her belly grew tighter. By the time he had fed her all but the last bite, she was panting and groaning in pain.

"Stop.....to....Full." She moaned.

"It is just one last bite." He whispered as he rubbed her belly a little harder. Her lips parted a she moaned and Naruto slipped the last shred of pastry passed her lips. She swallowed painfully as it slide into her belly.

"Oh....my....god,....so...full."

"This is what you wanted."

"Yesssssss." She hissed in pleasure. Naruto smiled at her gently. They just sat there in silence as Naruto rubbed her belly as hinata's bubbled, digesting away. " ....You...really...like....this?"

"Hinata, I love you." He said with a sweet but goofy grin. "And I always will. A little." Hinata's eyes closed as she started to turn away in disappointment. "A lot of fat isn't going to change that." Hinata looks back up at him as he strokes her hair out of her face. Naruto put a little pressure on Hinata's stuffed belly, causing her to groan lightly. As soon as her lips parted, he swooped in, claiming them. Stuffed to the brim, Hinata pulled herself into his lap and pressed her body flush up against his. Naruto smiled as he felt her plush breasts and her hard stomach press against his toned body.

1252.content:
Hinata clutched her belly in pain as it let off a loud, angry sounding growl. For the past month Hinata had been feeling an odd emptiness in her stomach. At first she was able to ignore it, simply thinking she needed to eat a little more during her meals. It was actually quite normal for a ninja's body to require more food then then it was normally given. However, no matter how much Hinata ate the empty, hungry feeling simply grew. At one point she had returned home from eating out with a belly so large that one could be forgiven for thinking she was pregnant.

After about a week-and-a-half of this and her hunger growing, she took notice of something. People, or more accurately, how tasty and filling the people around her looked. It suddenly acered to her that her belly hungered for other people. This realization horrified her, but she refused to tell anyone. Her family already thought her to be weak. She would not give them any further reasons to feel shamed by her. She should have told someone. She should have realized that resisting this overwhelming urge to grab the nearest person and start swallowing them down was a uphill battle that she couldn't win alone. She did not, and now she was faced with the consequences of that choice.

Her hunger had gotten so bad that she couldn't even look at her family without her mouth watering uncontrollably. She had kept the hunger at bay through sheer force of will. It was no longer enough however. She needed to eat someone. Preferably someone larger then herself or maybe multiple people.

Her stomach let loose another loud roar of hunger, the pain from the empty organ forcing Hinata to her knees. It was time to eat!

When is this taking place?

She made her way to the place and waited. She knew who to look for she was given the picture of him. When he soon arrived, he looked around to fine the person he was suppose to meet unaware that the person was Hanabi. She changed her clothes to look like she was part of the Akatsuki. She went up to him and got started. She quickly ate him and started to beat on him. After an hour, she started to get answers. He was afraid of being digested by her and just kept talking. When Hanabi got all she needed, she made her way home with her captive still in her belly.

“Hey, I thought you said you would let me go when we were done.” The guy said.

“About that, I actually lied about that. You are going to die now.” Hanabi said.

It was a little bit of a challenge due to the extra weight and how he was struggling. She made as much progress as she could to the village with what she got but with the constant struggling made it hard. After an hour, Hanabi hid and sat down behind a tree. While there, she heard someone coming. She checked and saw it was three more Akatsuki members, two males and a female. She knew she was done for if they catch her. The girl looked as young as her, may be a couple years older. Hanabi attacked them and at the two males but couldn’t fit the girl in her stomach.

“Please don’t eat me.” The girl pleaded.

“I wish I could but I’m too full to eat you.” Hanabi said.

With three people attacking her from the inside which put too much pain and a strain on her. She opened the scroll and read it. She performed it and felt her stomach acids began to bubble up and digest all those in her. To ensure she isn’t betrayed, she took the girl with her. Hanabi told the Hokage how it went and why she has a captive. Tsunade paid her for completing it. She then had the girl taken to get whatever they can out of her.

Tsunade told him that he will no longer will be living alone but will be living with someone he knows.

“Ok, you will be going by Naruko and will be living with…
155331121.title: New person, new life

“…Your teammate Sakura.” Tsunade said.

“At least I’m going to be living with someone I can trust.” Naruko said.

Tsunade got Naruko some new clothes that would be more fitting for a girl. Her new clothes were the same as her old ones when she was a male but fit more tightly and more feminine. The jacket was a little tight on her new CC-cup breasts so Naruko kept it open. She took off for Sakura’s place and hoped not to be recognized by anyone. She managed to get to Sakura’s and knocked on her door. Sakura answered the door and looked at Naruko. She quickly realized it was Naruto and laughed.

“Did Hinata or Tsunade put you put to do this?” Sakura asked.

“Neither did, I woke up like this and Tsunade said I will be staying with you for now.” Naruko said.

Naruko went in and Sakura showed her where she’ll be staying. Naruko got settled in and Sakura told her that if she need to, she can wear some of her clothes. Thinking of her new life, Naruko didn’t know much of how to be a girl or really much of girls really. So Sakura started to teach her what she needs to know. 1553311211.title: Sakura

15533112111.content:
To impregnate Naruko. She took Naruko to her room and got out a scroll she keeps hidden.

“Ok, this is a private scroll. I have always tried to use it on myself but never worked.” Sakura said.

“It looks to me that it takes 2 to do it. It says that both must be the same gender and one must do it to the other to successfully do it.” Naruko said.

“Ok, mind if I use it on you?”

“Go right ahead.”

Sakura did what the scroll said and showed and jabbed Naruko in the stomach.

“Pregnancy No Jutsu.” Sakura said.

Naruko felt a strong tingling around her midsection and it soon faded. She said that it might have worked but will have to wait a while before they know. Naruko and Sakura went out for the day and hoped they could find something that would fit Naruko and her new possible pregnancy. They changed Naruko attire to something that would less likely give her away as Naruto. 155331121112.content:
A couple months passed and Naruko is at a good 4 months into her pregnancy. She had quite a bit of a belly to show but it was a bit bigger for being only 4 months in. They guessed Naruko hat to be carrying twins at the least. Sakura has been taking good care of the new mother-to-be to make sure that she has an easy pregnancy and a safe birth. She learned from Tsunade that if she massages a pregnant woman’s belly and keep her well fed and happy, the baby she is carrying will come out safe and happy and will live a long life. So Sakura did that all day so that Naruko is happy and doesn’t have to worry much about her child.

“My, you look much better like this than when you were a boy, Naruko.” Sakura said.

“Is that so, then I should get pregnant more often and have a ton of babies.” Naruko said.

“Don’t over populate yourself. I have read somewhere that a woman once over impregnated herself and belly grew so big and blew open killing her and all the babies she was carrying.”

“Don’t worry, I’ll make sure I’ll carry up to 3, maybe 4 at once.”

“Good, now get some rest. We have some guests coming later.”

Naruko lie on her bed and fell asleep. She dreamt of having her little newborns in her arms while carrying 2 more in her belly. Naruko subconsciously rubbed her swollen belly while she sleeps. Naruko thought of possible names for her newborns but couldn’t think of any for she didn’t know the genders of her babies.

When night fell, Naruto got into some clothes she and Sakura got and went out. They were having a bit of a party for Naruko. They were celebrating her first and most joyful pregnancy yet. Every female friend they knew showed up and they had a great time together.
155331121112.title: A couple months pass

1553311211121.content:
Naruko was enjoying her day of leisure when she was called to the Hokage’s office. She hurried there to see what Tsunade wants. Naruko waddled in out of breath and wishing she didn’t have to hurry there.

“You need me Lady Tsunade?” Naruko asked.

“Yes, I need you to complete a mission for me. But since you’re so large in the middle, it will be a bit of a challenge for you. You’re fortunate it’s an easy C-rank mission.” Tsunade said.

Naruko took the mission and looked it over. She accepted it and set off. Naruko was going to a nearby village to aid in recovery from a recent attack. It would normally take an hour to get there but with her pregnancy, it was going to take Naruko all afternoon. She set off and hopes she could make it in time.

An hour into her travel, Naruko felt her babies starting to awaken and move. Naruko knew that once they wake up, they will start kicking letting her know that they are hungry. She kept going with one hand on her belly hoping she doesn’t have to stop. She felt one of them kick slightly which felt nice but was strange.

“I guess they are still waking up and not that hungry.” Naruko thought.

She pressed on and made sure not to push herself too far. When Naruko got to the village, she managed to get there safely without her babies bothering her too much. They would occasionally move or kick but let her be. Upon her arrival, Naruko was properly welcomed and told where to go. She was told that since she’s pregnant, she will be their leaders’ bodyguard until more come. When more come to help, she will be paid and be sent back to the Leaf Village. Naruko looked for their leader and hoped to find him or her soon. When Naruko found their leader, it was a heavily pregnant woman that looks like she’s about ready to explode with her massive belly. Naruko felt her belly and hopes she doesn’t get that big. She got to know her and they had a great time together.
1553311211121.title: Naruko gets sent on a mission

choices: Naruko wants to know what its like in the womens spa
15533112111211.content:
After being at the village for a week, Naruko was finally sent back to the Leaf Village. She was told that she was only going to be there for 2 days but a whole week was hard, especially for a pregnant woman. Fortunately Naruko was paid 10 times as much for the extra time and work she did.

“Finally paid and heading home. Momma will now get a couple good things to eat for your little tummies when she gets home.” Naruko said.

She kept going with one hand on her belly to see if her twins are fine as she went on. 10 minutes after departing, Naruko felt like someone was following her. She stopped and looked around to see who it was. After a minute, Naruko moved on. Everywhere she went, the person who was following her went as well. Naruko tried to lose her follower but couldn’t. She stopped one last time to face her stocker. She soon spotted her stocker and braced herself. The dark shadow came into the opening Naruko was in and she saw who it was.

“Well, if it isn’t little Hinata. How are you doing?” Naruko asked.

“Naruko, I’m doing well. How are the little ones doing?” Hinata asked shyly.

“These two, they haven’t bothered me for a week. They occasionally move but they are settle.”

Hinata walked up to Naruko and lifted up her shirt. She then put her head to Naruko’s belly and listened to her babies move. Hinata loved the feeling of pregnant woman’s belly and wished she had one. Naruko blushed at this and looked around to see if anyone was watching.

“Hinata, can you not embarrass me like this. Someone could be watching.” Naruko said.

Hinata looked up and saw the blonde girl was blushing and she thought it was cute. They set off back to the village and stopped every so often to make sure Naruko was fine. They took all day to do so and Naruko loved having Hinata with her and making sure she’s fine.
15533112111211.title: Naruko's return home

155331121112111.content:
Back at the Leaf Village, Sakura, Ino and Tenten were waiting for Naruko and Hinata to return.

“What’s taking them so long? I want to get this party started.” Ino said.

“Don’t worry Ino, they’ll be here soon. Remember, Naruko is pregnant and this is her first mission in 4 months.” Sakura said.

“Just hope Hinata doesn’t love her babies to drop out early.” Tenten said.

“Not funny Tenten.” Ino said.

After a while longer of waiting, Naruko and Hinata finally arrive. Their waiting party hugged Naruko for returning safely. They took her back to Sakura’s and got her prepped for the party. Sakura did Naruko’s hair, Ino took care of her clothes and Tenten did her makeup. Hinata just stood in the doorway watching as it all happened. When they got her ready, the group went out and had a great time. Naruko tried to take it easy but the girls kept pushing her to have fun.

“Do you girls know how late it is?” A voice said.

All 5 of them turned around and saw Tsunade walking to them.

“Ah, Naruko. How was the mission?” Tsunade asked.

“Everything is great there and they are making great recovery.” Naruko said.

“Good, give me a full report tomorrow. Now let’s party.”

The group went on and had a great time knowing that Naruko is back and safe. Naruko could feel her babies kick her every now and again in annoyance that they aren’t getting attention. When she finally got to settle down at Sakura’s, Sakura told her that she will help her get settled into her old home and will stop by everyday to check on her.
155331121112111.title: Naruko's home welcoming party

Naruko tried to think of her old home but she was way form it for so long that she couldn’t remember it. When they got there, the door was unlocked and someone was already inside. When they got to the living room, Hinata was there cleaning it already. She looked at Sakura and Naruko and smiled.

Sakura put the things she and Naruko had away and continued to clean for Hinata. Naruko relaxed on her couch and Hinata curled up next to her. She lifted up Naruko’s shirt and rubbed her belly. Naruko blushed and made sure Sakura wasn’t looking.

Hinata put her ear to Naruko’s belly and heard her twins moving. She could hear their heart beating inside her and they would occasionally kick her letting them know they were awake. When her babies were hungry, Hinata and Sakura rushed into the kitchen to see who could make better food for Naruko. Naruko was happy that she has two friends that will do anything for her safe pregnancy. She just sat in her living room rubbing her belly waiting from her food. 1553311211221212111.title: Arrival at the temple

15533112112212121111.content:
When evening rolled around, Naruko could hardly think about anything other than food. Weeks of stretching her bellies capacity had made her incredibly gluttonous and not eating for a whole day was pure torture.

When a servant of the temple told her that the feast would be ready in an hour, she could hardly wait and stopped her training. She wanted to go to the banquet hall immediately, but somebody stopped her before she could make her way to her price.

"There's no way you will show up all sweaty and dirty from training to a feast held just for you." Sakura looked pretty annoyed at having to remind her obese teammate of this fact. "You are going to clean yourself up and get dressed in something more formal."

"But Sakura-chan, I'm so hungry and it is so hard to wash myself, plus I don't have anything to wear other than the clothes I am wearing now." The pinkette couldn't help but throw her arms up in frustration. "Fine, I'll help you wash and I'll ask around for something you could wear. Come on, I belive I saw a boathouse a couple hundred meters from here."

With that Sakura formed a seal and a shadow clone popped into existence next to her. "Go and ask around if somebody has something for Naruko to wear." The clone nodded in understanding and disappeared, leaving Naruko and Sakura alone in the training ground once again. The pinkette and the blonde started their journey towards the boathouse, one walking and one waddling, Sakura having to adjust her speed to not leave the porcine blonde alone.



When they arrived, Naruko was once again covered in a thin layer of sweat, the liquid making her rolls glisten in the evening sun. Sakura ordered a private area for her and her teammate, and handed the cashier a few bills, paying for their stay in advance. When they arrived in the changing room, they Naruko sat down on a bench, the poor piece of furniture creaking under the blondes weight.

"*pant* Sakura*pant*-chan, could you give me a *pant* hand, I am too exhausted to get my *pant* clothes off." The blonde was clearly too tired to do it herself, so Sakura, who was already naked helped her friend. While undressing the blonde, Sakura was mesmerized by her best friends body, the rolls upon rolls that items could get lost in, the large, smooth slabs of fat, that felt like enormous heavy marshmallows. Before she realized what she was doing, Sakura began groping and prodding at the now exposed fat, getting moans from the girl that was at her mercy.

Before things could go any further however, Sakura realized what she was doing, and stopped herself. She now averted her eyes and nervously helped her friend to her feet, now going into the hot springs area, which was cut off from the outside world by a wooden fence. While Sakura cleaned herself and her friend, an awkward silence befell the two.

"Sakura""Naruko" Both started exactly at the same time. "You first, Sakura-chan“ The obese one of the two said."I am sorry Naruko, but there is something I have to tell you. When you first started out gaining weight I told you that it was only for your ninja career, but that wasn't the reason why I wanted you to become fat. No. The reason was because I have a fat fetish, and at first you were only eye candy for my fetish, to satisfy my lust, but after all the time we lived together, I realized something. I love you!"

Naruko was shocked, and was stunned for several seconds. She thought about what her friend said and then made her decision. Meanwhile Sakura was close to tears, thinking that she would be rejected. The pink haired female was surprised when a pudgy hand grabbed her wrist and pulled her towards its owner, the pinkette now sinking into the incredibly soft body of her teammate and crush. When she looked up she was surprised to feel Narukos lips on her own, the blonde having initiated a passionate kiss. Tears streamed down Sakuras cheeks, but these weren't tears of sadness, no, they were tears of joy. The two of them could have stayed in this position forever, their bodies pressing into each other, Sakura sinking into her far larger lover if there wasn't one little thing that was distracting Naruko. One little thing between them, but which one of them loved and the other would learn to love

A deep rumble was emitted from the little thing between them, which wasn't so little at all, because it could hold quantities of food that - for a normal person at least - would seem ridiculous.

Sakura smiled a cat-like smile and looked into her lovers eyes, all the while rubbing the thing between them which was Narukos belly. "So I hear you are pretty hungry." Naruko blushed in embarrassment and averted her eyes. "We can't habe you get hungry, we wouldn't want you to waste away."

At this, the fat foxy female couldn't help but grin, she would be too stuffed to move after this feast.




The two were nearing the banquet hall, Naruko and Sakura wearing nearly identical kimonos (the only differences being the color, Sakuras being red and Narukos being yellow and of course the size) which the shadow clone had procured from somewhere. Somehow it had found clothing for Naruko which was even a bit loose. Now the obese blonde was assaulted with a series of smells, some she knew by heart as she had eaten them all her life, but most of them were completely unknown, but nonetheless they made her mouth water in anticipation.

They got to the table that was marked for them by the bench that replaced two of the chairs, which was obviously Narukos seating arrangement and immediately the first course of appetizers was laid out in front of Narukos greedy hands. She couldn't stop herself from shoving several into her mouth at once.

Next was the first course, which consisted of a ridiculous amount of pasta, covered in the thickest sauces imaginable. Naruko was still ravenous, not even close to being satisfied by the appetizers, so she ate with her hands, shoving more food into her mouth at once than Sakura would be able to eat in a day.

Second course consisted of an incredible amount of different meats and baked potatoes, the blonde now being able to think straight after having satisfied her hunger for a bit chose a more dignified approach, actually utilizing the manners she had been taught.

By now most of the other participants of the feast had given up trying to compete with Naruko. She just had the superior belly.

Next came a servant with, by the looks of it, an entire boar, spread out on a platter and decorated with different kinds of salads, vegetables and all that covered in another thick layer of sauce. Naruko ate without stopping, but she was slowly getting full. Sakura noticing this, and already having been stuffed since the first course was happy to help her new girlfriend, rubbing her belly and speaking encouraging words into the fatties ears.

After finishing off the board she had a short break, in which she drank nearly a gallon of soda, the liquid sadly washing down all the delicious tastes but also refreshing her.

Sakura was getting more and more excited. She had never seen somebody eat even close to that amount of food, and it looked like her little *ahem* big porker wasn't even close to done yet.

Now a huge amount of rice and fried chicken was brought to the blonde beauty, the servants long since having realized that she was the only one still eating. At this point Narukos arms were getting tired, so she asked Sakura to feed her, which she gladly did.

Narukos belly had by now been expanded by the several dozen pounds of food until the previously slightly loose kimono strained to hold it in. Narukos arms rubbed at her exposed flesh, her mind slowly falling into a food coma. All the while she was getting fed by Sakura, who at the moment fed her a 20 pound steak.

Before Naruko fell unconscious however, her nose took in what the next course brought, which were two huge pots of the food of the gods, called Ramen. Each had to hold at least 20 gallons. Naruko looked at her girlfriend, eyes silently pleading, all the while still chewing on a piece of beef.

Sakura chuckled at the look on her teammates face, understanding what her big bellied beauty wanted. She took the first pot into her hands and used her super strength to lift it towards the mouth of the gluttonous beast that was her girlfriend. She could feel the pot getting lighter by the second, and in not even a minute it was empty.

Now Naruko looked pleasingly towards the second container of her favorite food, her belly despite its overwhelming load growling in hunger. When she began drinking the second pot, her kimono finally gave up, and her belly was freed from its prison, a loud smack echoing throughout the hall, her belly having fallen onto the ground.

Sakura could had to hold in a moan, as the idea of her girlfriend being big enough for her belly to touch the ground forced her to nearly orgasm.

Naruko was in a frenzy for the rest of the evening, not remembering anything past that point, except that she had eaten more than ever before and that Sakura and her had more than one public make out session when waiting for the next delicacies to be brought before her. She also remembered eating so much that it took 5 men plus her girlfriend with super strength to carry her back to bed.

When she awoke the next morning, she was greeted by...

The obese teen grabbed Sakura's head and pulled her down towards her face, initiating a long passionate kiss, the two lovebirds exploring each other's mouth with their tongues. Sakura couldn't help herself but moan in pleasure, her thin body sinking into her lovers fat one.

"Eat up Naruko, we have to make sure you have enough energy to make the trip home today." The pinkette told her girlfriend. Naruko. Thankfully the shower was large enough for the blonde, and after Sakura helped her get clean she got out without any trouble again. It took more than a few towels to get her rolls clean tough.

She stepped on it, and because she couldn't read the numbers herself she asked Sakura to do it for her. The pinkette had to get on her arms and knees to see the reading, the beautiful blubber of the rooms other occupant otherwise blocking sight of the scale's display.

"689 Pounds." The shock in Sakura's voice was clearly audible and after she was finished talking Naruko too was shocked. Before they left the village she was only a few pounds shy of 600, which meant she had gained nearly a hundred pounds from a single feast. It should have been impossible, but the proof was right in front of them.

Before they could contemplate any more, someone knocked on the door. Sakura went to open it and returned with Naruko's clothes. Apparently they had been washed and repaired from yesterday's training. When they left Konoha the clothes had fit Naruko perfectly, but now, after she had gained all this new weight they didn't do such a good job at covering everything. Her underwear was uncomfortably tight, the panties giving her a wedgie and the bra struggling to hold in her developed chest, which was big enough to put Tsunade to shame. Naruko's shirt now rolled up on her belly, exposing the fleshy sphere up to the belly button and her jacket was too small to zip up, which meant she had to leave it open. Also the sleeves were too tight for her huge arms, which were bigger than normal girls waists. Her mini-skirt thankfully was elastic, so she got it over her expanded derriere, but it didn't cover anything at all, the lower half of her booty being exposed to the elements.

After asking for a traveling cloak to keep her mostly decent the two Konoha ninja departed from the temple, and made their way towards their home. It took longer than their arrival, because they made stops at every Inn that they got to to get something to eat.

When the two lovebirds arrived back home they made their way towards the Hokage to submit their mission report. When they arrived in Tsunade's office, Naruko took of her cloak and the blonde Hokage couldn't have been shocked more. It was impossible for someone to gain that much weight in a few days. Naruko and Sakura reported what went on in the mission and after they were finished Tsunade wanted to speak to the obese blonde alone, so she asked the rooms other occupant to leave which she did.

"Naruko, I want to to talk about something that is becoming a real problem here. What I want to talk about is...

“I forgot I sealed away his elasticity after sealing the Nine-Tails in him.” Kushina said.

Kushina jabbed her son on the seal which caused him some pain. The seal broke and Naruto started to balloon up with the remaining tank. She got him out so he doesn’t destroy their home. They went to a large field and Kushina hooked 4 tanks up to a hose and put it up his butt. She opened them one at a time and opened the next one when the one before it was empty. She had a total of 40 tanks and kept using them until she was down to the last one. Naruto was completely inflated with 4 cones that were his arms and legs with his hands and feet on them. Kushina could tell Naruto was turned on somehow by this and she liked it. She couldn’t believe he was more than 10 times bigger than she was. Kushina poked her son’s side but didn’t expect what happened next. She accidentally poked him a little too hard and her nail punctured him. Naruto’s eyes widened when he felt it.

“Uh oh.” Kushina said.

As she moved her finger away, her nail made things worse by making the hole bigger. When she got her finger an inch away, Naruto blew up leaving nothing behind. Kushina slammed against the wall behind her hard and was knocked out unconscious. When she came through some time later, all that was left of her son was shreds of his orange jump suit and his body. She looked around to find anything salvageable but couldn’t until she found something. It wasn’t much but it was his heart. She took it for she knew a jutsu that would bring him back.
15533211122122122112.title: Naruto explodes

155332111221221221122.content:
Kushina kept her sons heart well preserved until she found the right scroll. She looked threw it and knew what to do. It said that the user must have the heart of the person that has died to bring them back to life. Since she had her son’s heart, this was perfect. To perform it, she or someone else must eat the heart whole and perform the jutsu. Kushina carefully ate her son’s heart and performed the jutsu. When it was complete, Kushina hoped to bring back her son.

“Well, I better get this place cleaned up. It smells in here.” Kushina said.

She got to cleaning and getting the place in order. She didn’t know how her some managed to last this long alone in these kind of conditions. Then again, she went through as much suffering as well. Kushina sighed and put her hand onto her belly. For some reason, she felt her son’s heart beat from within her stomach. That startled Kushina a bit but she then knew her little Naruto is back alive.

“Soon we’ll be together again my little man.” Kushina thought.

She got settled in and waited. She didn’t know how long it will take before she brings him completely back but it will be a while. She dozed off for a quick nap without knowing it but was woken up some time later by a kick from within. She put her hands onto her belly and felt how much bigger it is. She looked down and saw she was actually full term with her son again. She knew this for she remembers how big she was when she was pregnant. Kushina smiled and rubbed her belly.

“Just a little longer Naruto and you’ll be back.” Kushina said.

Kushina kept Naruto in until he was completely back to normal. He started to freak out and tried to get out of his mother. She smiled and blushed while it happened and actually loved the feeling. She told him to settle down and she easily let him out of her back side. Naruto was disgusted by that but then again he was eaten by a giant snake in the Death Forest. So being blown up and then having his heart eaten by his own mother and brought back to life in her and then crapped out of her wasn’t all that bad.
155332111221221221122.title: Kushina uses the jutsu

choices: Kushina teaches Naruto their family jutsu
Naruto pushes his body to his limits
1553321112212212211221.content:
Naruto loved how he is spending time with his mother but there is still the problem of a team. To help, they actually got Hinata on their team. Seeing this, Naruto knew he could be in some trouble. Of course, Hinata isn’t really the kind of girl who would fight back unless it’s to protect her team or provoked. Sakura on the other hand was much more aggressive if or when needed. He was home alone while his mother was out doing some scouting out an area of a recent attack. When she came home, she was told to tell him that they might need him. Naruto looked at his mother and how she looked with her hair up in a ponytail and in her ninja attire.

“Listen Naruto, with the amount of chakra you have could easily be used for this. It’s a scroll containing a jutsu that I need you to do.” Kushina said.

“What I don’t wanna?” Naruto asked.

“As your mother I command you to do so! If you don’t, I will shove you back in where you came from and keep you there for life.”

Hearing that, he knew he had to do it. So she gave him 3 days to learn it. He worked at it the whole time but couldn’t get it. On the third day, is mother was pissed that he didn’t do it before now. He tried it one last time before taking a beating from her but this time, he felt something. It was a tingling feeling all over then it became like he was floating. Kushina watched as Naruto started to bloat up like a balloon. Sakura and Hinata soon showed up and watched as it happened. He kept inflating bigger and bigger until he looked like a large blow up doll. Kushina checked him out and said that the jutsu he used is an inflation jutsu. They guessed that it turns the used into an inflated doll like being.

“I don’t think it’s done yet.” Naruto said.

They watched as he continued to get bigger. He soon stopped when he nearly doubled in size. They made sure not to harm him and hoped that it wears off soon. When it did, Naruto could barely walk due to his muscles from being stretched out. So Kushina got him onto her back all the way home. When they got there, Kushina put it away in a safe place for now.
1553321112212212211221.title: Naruto uses an inflation jutsu
